pullrequest.title: Use internal urdf when we can't find it externally.

content.raw:
So there's really three states the variable could have: `True`, `False`, and `unset`

* `True`: use internal urdf, don't even bother looking for the external package
* `False`: use external urdf, and fail if it can't be found
* `unset`: use external urdf if it can be found; otherwise fall back to internal version

How does that sound? I think we can detect when cmake variables are unset.
